snippet: A coalition including some of the nation’s largest evangelical Christian organizations said on Monday that Congress should include “clear steps to citizenship” for illegal immigrants in any bill to overhaul the immigration system.
abstract: A coalition including some of the nation’s largest evangelical Christian organizations said on Monday that Congress should include “clear steps to citizenship” for illegal immigrants in any bill to overhaul the immigration system.

headline.main: Evangelical Groups Call for Path to Citizenship in Immigration Overhaul
